text:
Hey All, I just launched a Laravel HubSpot Starter Kit for public apps <https://github.com/evendrop/laravel-HubSpot-starter-kit>
Contributions and collaborations are welcome.
It's meant to give you a good starting point when creating a new app that interacts with HubSpot API

Frameworks / Libraries
• <https://laravel.com/docs/9.x|Laravel 9.x>
• <https://vitejs.dev/|Vite 3.x>
• <https://vuejs.org/guide/introduction.html|Vue 3.x> with Vue Router
• <https://pinia.vuejs.org/introduction.html|Pinia> State Manager
• <https://tailwindcss.com/|Tailwind> 3.x
• <https://laravel.com/docs/9.x/valet|Laravel Valet>
• <https://github.com/tighten/ziggy|Laravel Ziggy>
Features
• Integrated SPA (Utilizes Laravel API and vue 3 front-end on the same server instance)
• Laravel Auth
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth|HubSpot OAuth2> flow
• A user can belong to many teams
• A team can add many portals
• Set team and portal in session to allow subsequent api calls within the app relate to chosen portal instance
• Procfile included for easy deployment to <https://www.heroku.com/|Heroku>
Thanks for looking, feel free to reach out to me if you're interested in contributing
